name: Tubot's Adaptive Scrollbars
description: Dark on dark websites, light on light websites, thin on thin websites, based on Chrome scroll bar. Should work universally.
additional_info:
v1

Should work everywhere. Tested on google.com, messenger.com, app.simplenote.com, inoreader.com, daringfireball.net

The color is based on the background color of the web-page, which unfortunately is white on some dark websites.
